services:
  mysql-auth:
    image: mysql:8.4
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: instagram_auth
      MYSQL_USER: app
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: app
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    volumes:
      - mysql_auth_data:/var/lib/mysql

  auth-service:
    build: ./services/auth-service
    environment:
      SPRING_DATASOURCE_URL: jdbc:mysql://mysql-auth:3306/instagram_auth?useSSL=false&allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true&serverTimezone=UTC
      SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME: app
      SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD: app
    depends_on:
      - mysql-auth
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"

volumes:
  mysql_auth_data:
